Same applies to PROJECT_PERMISSIONS_JSON_PROPERTY_NAME

timeline.message: Management of READ access to project #7945

timeline.body: @vbradnitski the `value` can be `NULL`, will be better to use `PRIVATE.name().equals(value)` or `Objects.equals(PRIVATE.name(), value)`. Also you can use `ProjectReadAccessType.valueOf(...)`
timeline.bodyText: @vbradnitski the value can be NULL, will be better to use PRIVATE.name().equals(value) or Objects.equals(PRIVATE.name(), value). Also you can use ProjectReadAccessType.valueOf(...)
timeline.bodyHTML: @vbradnitski the value can be NULL, will be better to use PRIVATE.name().equals(value) or Objects.equals(PRIVATE.name(), value). Also you can use ProjectReadAccessType.valueOf(...)
